msbt.message: Hey, weird question for you.<10_4 /> Did you take a shower today?
Sure did.
Nope.
How dare you!
AhhI thought so. I know this is kinda weird, but you smelled amazing, so I just really wanted to know what product you used in your hair!
No? But your hair smells amazing! I'm sorry—I can smell it from here.You've heard of supertasters, right? Well, I'm kind of like a supersmeller. It's a blessing and a curse.

I'm sorry, I'm sorry! It's justyour hair smelled amazing and I wanted to know what product you use. I can smell it from halfway across the island! It's not bad—I was just cursed with a very sensitive nose.
Pop quiz, ! Which one of these is truly ME?
The afro wig. The regent wig. The mohawk wig.
The wrestling mask. The football helmet. The catcher's mask. The knight's helmet.
The fencing mask. The racing helmet. The stagehand hat.
Yes, that's what I was thinking! I know it's a little different, but I was overdue for a brand refresh. Say hi toNew ! Now with 110 percent swag and flow, !
Hmm, are you sure? When I wear that, it covers up about 98 percent of my vision. Oh well. If you look good, you can see good, right? I guess I probably shouldn't drive anywhere
OK, I'm basically unrecognizable in that. So what are you trying to say? I'm just teasing. It's awesome! You've got great taste.
Think fast! I'm gonna ask you a question that will determine the rest of your life. Imagine a field of blooming flowers. What color are the flowers?
Red.
Yellow.
Purple.
White.

Alright. By answering that simple question, you've opened a window to your soul. So I'll take a peek! Red is the color of passion, so you must be a passionate person. You act first and think laterif at all. Just like me! So, am I right?<10_4 /> Or am I right, ?

Alright. By answering that simple question, you've opened a window to your soul. So I'll take a peek! You want to share your talents with the whole world! Any room you're in is the room with the party. Just like me! So, am I right?<10_4 /> Or am I right, ?

Alright. By answering that simple question, you've opened a window to your soul. So I'll take a peek! You're secretive! What I said before about opening a window? I was bluffing. You're a closed book! Just like me! So, am I right?<10_4 /> Or am I right, ?

Alright. By answering that simple question, you've opened a window to your soul. So I'll take a peek! You're a selfless and generous person! You always put others before yourself. Just like me! So, am I right?<10_4 /> Or am I right, ?
Alright, . See if you can answer this.You're driving a car. Any kind of car. But WHERE are you driving it?
In the city.
Along the coast.
On a desert road.
Over a mountain.

Alright. Let me just shift gears into psychic-road-reader modeChoosing city streets means you're comfortable with crowds and noise. You live for the excitement! Also, you must be an excellent driver. Let me know if you want to do a road trip, !

Alright. Let me just shift gears into psychic-road-reader modeDriving along the coast can be super relaxingor completely terrifying, ! The cliffs! The high winds! Birds everywhere! You're an absolute maniac, !

Alright. Let me just shift gears into psychic-road-reader modeA lonely desert highway, eh? That makes you some kind of road warrior! Let me guessyou could drive for, like, 20 hours straight listening to the same song the whole time, right? Remind me never to take a road trip with you!

Alright. Let me just shift gears into psychic-road-reader modeOver a mountain! You're ambitious! Me, I'd rather drive on a flat road. , I'd rather walk! Oh, rightthis isn't about me. It's about you, mountain driver! Well, rev it up you maniac, you!
Ooh, that outfit you're wearing today C'est magnifique! That's Spanish for bellissimo! Do you always dress to the nines, or is it a special occasion?
Absolutely.
Not really.
It's a secret.
I knew it. Folks with good taste can always spot other folks with good taste, .
Oh, come on. You can't be that stylish without trying a little bit. Orcan you? is it possible that you've attained an entirely new level of swagger?!
, so mysterious! Well, two can play at that game. Guess what color my socks are! Ha! I'll never tell.

Get this, . I'm planning the most epic road trip.The playlist I made would rock your socks off. My snack selection is a gourmand's fantasy. But none of that matters if I don't know where I'm going. That's where you come in. Where should I drive?
To the big city!
Along the coast.
Stay local.
Into the sunset...
Ooh, I like the sound of that. I've been a big fish in a little pond for a while now.Maybe it's time to spread my wings and fly. But hold on. Am I the fish or the bird in this scenario?
I can picture it now Me, driving along a rugged coastlineSunlight bouncing off the cool, blue watersas the wind blows through my immaculately manicured hair Uh, maybe I'll keep the windows up.
You're right! Why travel far and wide when you have an established social network in your own backyard? Though the lack of roads might pose a problem
Of course! Why didn't I think of that? There's nothing like a journey into the great unknown.
Now that that's all settled, there's only one thing left to do. Learn how to drive! Easy peasy
